Mignane aka **"Halaand"** is an amazing PhD student working on the Molecular Epidemiology and Diagnostic of Nairoviruses. He primarily focused on Dugbe Virus, Bandia virus (Understudied viruses) and the deadly widespread Crimee Congo Hemorraghic fever virus.

Skills : Classical Virology, Molecular Biology, Sequencing, ELISA

*Publications :*

1.[CDC Trioplex diagnostic assay underperforms in detection of circulating Chikungunya West African genotype](https://journals.asm.org/doi/epub/10.1128/jcm.00405-24)

2.[Molecular Detection and Genetic Characterization of Two Dugbe Orthonairovirus Isolates Detected from Ticks in Southern Senegal](https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/16/6/964)
